message:
Hi every one, 
I have worked on a lot of projects using J2EE open frameworks like struts ,mvc,jsf- spring,seam,EJB and now I'm moving to a challenge with ADF , 

it seems microsoft like framework ,based on the model then generating from IDE , wizards all other things EO ,VO 

I need some thing like this example in spring for example : 

I need a jsf page with a backing bean ,then  a spring Facade bean injected using DI to handle some business containing a transaction on some steps from different business objects till the dao and DB .

how can I achieve something like that in ADF , 

any help is appreciated
